Hymn.Arabic: فَانْطَلَقَ يَسُوعُ مَعَ تَلَامِيذِهِ إِلَى عَبْرِ الْبَحْرِ ، وَتَبِعَهُ جَمْعٌ كَثِيرٌ مِنَ الْجَلِيلِ وَمِنَ الْيَهُودِيَّةِ
Hymn.English: 7 But Jesus withdrew with His disciples to the sea. And a great multitude from Galilee followed Him, and from Judea

Hymn.Arabic: وَمِنْ أُورُشَلِيمَ وَمِنْ أَدُومِيَّةَ وَمِنْ عَبْرِ الأَرْدُنَ وَجَمْعُ كَثِيرٌ مِنْ صُورَ وَصَيْدَا ، وَسَمِعُوا بِمَا صَنَعَ فَأَتَوْا إِلَيْهِ.
Hymn.English: 8 and Jerusalem and Idumea and beyond the Jordan; and those from Tyre and Sidon, a great multitude, when they heard how many things He was doing, came to Him.

Hymn.Arabic: فَقَالَ لِتَلَامِيذِهِ بِأَنْ تُلَازِمَهُ سَفِينَةٌ لِسَبَبٍ الْجَمْعِ ، كَيْ لَا يَزْحَمُوهُ ،
Hymn.English: 9 So He told His disciples that a small boat should be kept ready for Him because of the multitude, lest they should crush Him.

Hymn.Arabic: لِأَنَّهُ كَانَ قَدْ أَبْرَأَ كَثِيرِينَ ، حَتَّى وَقَعَ عَلَيْهِ لِيَلْمِسَهُ كُلُّ مَنْ فِيهِ دَاءٌ
Hymn.English: 10 For He healed many, so that as many as had afflictions pressed about Him to touch Him.

Hymn.Arabic: وَالْأَرْوَاحُ النَّجِسَةُ حِينَمَا نَظَرَتْهُ خَرَّتْ قُدَّامَهُ وَصَرَخَتْ قَائِلَةً: " إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ هُوَ ابْنُ اللَّهِ ! ." .
Hymn.English: 11 And the unclean spirits, whenever they saw Him, fell down before Him and cried out, saying, You are the Son of God.
12 But He sternly warned them that they should not make Him known.     Glory is due to our God to the age of all ages. Amen
